resources.string:
LoudFlash was created to help keep the noise down at night. 

Set the recommended threshold (max loudness) and the LED will flash when the sound level is higher than the threshold. 

Designed and developed by: Artur Lukin 
Contact me at avlukin@indiana.edu for comments.

80dB - Vacuum
90dB - Shouting
100dB - Construction Site
110dB - Chainsaw
120dB - Thunder
130dB - Jet Takeoff

20dB - Ticking Watch
30dB - Silent Room
40dB - Soft Whisper
50dB - Library
60dB - Conversation
70dB - Dishwasher
